--------
CONTROLS
--------

The controls in the game are for moving the ship and firing (besides the ones for menu navigation).
Players can use the keyboard and Gamepads, and the input system that will be chosen depends on the number of inputs detected and the number of players chosen in-game.

- In 1 player mode, the game can be played with both the keyboard and a gamepad (if available).
- In 2 player mode, if there is no gamepad available the keyboard is split into a left side for player 1 and a right side for player 2. If there is one gamepad available player 1 uses the keyboard and player 2 uses the gamepad. If there are two gamepads available player 1 can use both the keyboard and the first gamepad, and player 2 uses the second gamepad.
